about_the_game:
Loyal Bear fans will limit DLC activation to bring you an additional Loyal Bear train, a cutting-edge locomotive from the Dragon Kingdom: Rogue , and a powerful onboard engineer: Paradigm .
They are not top-notch, but they will grow with you from the beginning of the game.

Train picture left blank
Zhongxiong:
The new electric locomotive of the Dragon Kingdom is famous for its outstanding speed.

However, as a new prototype, it still has drawbacks such as traction and insufficient endurance, but as a short-distance passenger locomotive, it can be said that it is better.

Paradigm:
Nicknamed Bucket. The cargo engineer from the Dragon Kingdom is also one of the makers of the cutting-edge locomotive robbers in the Dragon Kingdom.
In order to better collect train information and help maintain, follow the "knight-errant" to the country of Beijing and join the protagonist team.
When you arrange him on the train set, it will bring additional gain attributes to your train set.
